1: <mistake>@@//dag /lus</mistake> <mistake>dag</mistake> sems ni dag par <mistake>byed//byis</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> dar ma de nas <mistake>rgyan//bzhi</mistake> pa skye <mistake>dgu'i</mistake> bdag <mistake>po'o//shes</mistake> <mistake>naba</mistake> nu mar yan lag <mistake>ni//reg</mistake> pas byang chub sems
2: <mistake>'pho'i</mistake> <mistake>bde/ /'o</mistake> ma <mistake>'din</mistake> pas dbang bskur <mistake>ba//gang</mistake> las <mistake>bade</mistake> thob de byis <mistake>pa'o//yun</mistake> ring gsang bar spros las <mistake>skyes//byang</mistake> chub sems ni 'pho ba'i <mistake>bde//gsang</mistake> ba'i <mistake>dbad</mistake>
3: <mistake>/bskur</mistake> gsang ba <mistake>ni // dang</mistake> las bde <mistake>thobo</mistake> de dar <mistake>ma// yun</mistake> ring gsang bar <mistake>spos</mistake> las <mistake>skyes//rdo</mistake> rje rtse mor <mistake>g.yo</mistake> ba'i <mistake>bde//shesra</mistake> <mistake>ba ye</mistake> shes dbang bskur <mistake>ba//gang</mistake> las <mistake>g.yo</mistake>
4: <mistake>/ba'i</mistake> bgrod de <mistake>rgan// phyag</mistake> rgya chen po rjes chags las // skyes pa <mistake>g.yo</mistake> med bde ba <mistake>ni//shes</mistake> rab chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> da bang bskur <mistake>ba//gang</mistake> las <mistake>g.yo</mistake> med rtegs pa <mistake>de//skye</mistake> <mistake>dgu'i</mistake> <mistake>badag</mistake>
5: por rnam shes <mistake>bya// skyo ba</mistake> pa thams cad <mistake>skyedg</mistake> <mistake>mdzadg</mistake> <mistake>pa//rdo</mistake> rje sems dpa' sems dpa' <mistake>che//byang</mistake> sems gnyis med mi 'gyur <mistake>ba//'di</mistake> ni dam <mistake>chig</mistake> sems dpa' <mistake>'gyur//rdo</mistake> <mistake>rjez'</mistake>
6: rnam 'byor rnam pa bzhi // dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir <mistake>bshadg</mistake> <mistake>ba//rnal</mistake> 'byor pa yi thar ster <mistake>byed//'di</mistake> nyid kyi ni sgrub byed <mistake>bya//rab</mistake> gsal bsam gyis mi khyab <mistake>pa'i//du</mistake> sogs mtshan ma
7: de rnams <mistake>kyi// shes</mistake> rab gzugs <mistake>brnan</mistake> nam mkha' <mistake>mnyam //yod</mistake> dang med las rnam par <mistake>'das//rang</mistake> <mistake>gi</mistake> sems kyi <mistake>rkyan</mistake> gyi <mistake>don//rdul</mistake> phran las skyes tshogs pa <mistake>rnams//kun</mistake> nas yongs su
8: dor ba <mistake>yis // du</mistake> ba smig rgyu mkha' snang <mistake>dang// sgron</mistake> ma 'bar ba zla nyi <mistake>m/mun</mistake> can cha dang thig le <mistake>che/sna</mistake> tshogs gzugs <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>rtan</mistake> <mistake>'odog</mistake> <mistake>sal</mistake> <mistake>ba//bkab</mistake> <mistake>rdang</mistake> ma <mistake>bkakba</mistake> mig dag <mistake>gis//stong</mistake> par <mistake>r'dg</mistake>
